samarkand:
• Departure at 05:00. Arrival at 10:00.
  • Visit to the mausoleum of Imam Al Bukhari.
  • Visit to Mirza Ulugbek Observatory.
  • Visit to the mausoleum of Khoja Doniyor.
  • Visit to the Shakhi Zinda monument and the mausoleum of I.A. Karimov
  • Lunch at a local establishment.
  • Visiting Gur-Emir Mausoleum.
  • Visiting the Registan Square.
  • Departure at 17:40. Arrival in Tashkent at 22:00.
tashkent:
• Departure at 05:00
  • Excursion in Sukak
  • Excursion in the memorial complex “Zarkent buva”
  • Light lunch at the cottage in Kumyshkan (11:45 – 12:20)
  • Excursion (hike) in the mountains of Kumyshkan . Visit to the memorial complex “Khazrati Ali Buva”
  • Dinner. (16:10 – 17:00)
  • Free time (swimming, hiking, etc.) (17:00 – 19:00)
  • Departure to Tashkent at 19:10. Arrival at 22:00

bukhara.day_1_schedule:
• Departure at 05:00. Arrival at 10:00
  • Visit to the mausoleum of Imam Al Bukhari
  • Visit to Mirza Ulugbek Observatory
  • Visit to the mausoleum of Khoja Doniyor
  • Visit to the Shakhi Zinda monument and the mausoleum of I.A. Karimov
  • Lunch at a local establishment
  • Visiting Gur-Emir Mausoleum
  • Visiting the Registan Square
  • Check-in at the hotel at 19:00. Overnight at the hotel.
bukhara.day_2_schedule:
• Breakfast at the hotel. Departure to Bukhara at 09:00
  • Arrival in Bukhara at 13:00
  • Lunch at a local establishment
  • Excursion around Bukhara Visiting historical sights such as:
    • -Winter residence of the rulers of Bukhara Ark Citadel.
    • -Mausoleum of Ismail Samani.
    • -Mausoleum of Chashma Ayub
    • -Poly-Kalyan Ensemble: Kalyan Minaret, Kalyan Mosque, Miri-Arab Madrassah
    • -Summer residence Sitorai Mokhi Khosa Palace
    • -Trading domes
    • -Lyabi-Khaus Ensemble
    • -Chor-Minor Madrasah
  • Dinner at a local establishment. Accommodation in a hotel. Overnight at the hotel
bukhara.day_3_schedule:
• Breakfast at the hotel.
  • Continuation of excursions in Bukhara
  • Lunch at a local establishment
  • Departure to Tashkent at 15:00. Arrival in Tashkent at 22:00
